Package simulator.elevatormodules

Provides sensors for detecting car position, door position, and door reversal triggers, and actuators for turning on button lights moving the doors.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AtFloorCanPayloadTranslator  
AtFloorSensor System object that detects when the Car is within a specified distance from a floor landing.
BooleanCanTranslator Utility superclass for CAN payload translators with a single boolean value.
CarButtonLight implementation of the physical button and light The main purpose of this class is to provide an interface for the passenger objects.
CarLantern Provides a passenger interface to the car lanterns
CarLevelPositionCanPayloadTranslator  
CarLevelPositionSensor Sends CarLevelPositionnetwork messages when the Car passes one of the position sensors on the hoistway rails.
CarPositionIndicator Provides a passenger interface to the car lanterns
CarWeightAlarm Provides a passenger interface to the car lanterns
CarWeightAlarmCanPayloadTranslator  
CarWeightCanPayloadTranslator  
CarWeightSensor Controls the weight alarm inside the car.
Door provides a passenger interface to the doors
DoorClosedCanPayloadTranslator  
DoorClosedSensor Sends network messages to indicate whether each door is less than 1% open.
DoorMotor Models the doors of the elevator in the simulation.
DoorOpenedCanPayloadTranslator  
DoorOpenedSensor Sends network messages to indicate whether each door is greater than 99% open.
DoorReversalCanPayloadTranslator  
DoorReversalSensor This module receives the framework reversals from the passengers and sends them on the network.
DriveObject Models the motion of the car in the simulation.
HallButtonLight implementation of the physical button and light The main purpose of this class is to provide an interface for the passenger objects.
HoistwayLimitSensor Listens for CarPositionPayload framework messages and sends network and framework HoistwayLimitPayload messages when the Car exceeds a specified position.
HoistwayLimitSensorCanPayloadTranslator  
LevelingCanPayloadTranslator  
LevelingSensor Implement a physical model of the leveling vane.
Module Utility superclass for system modules.
Modules A static class that instantiates all controllers, sensors, and actuators that are necessary for the elevator simulation.
PassengerModule subclass of module that sends passenger events
Safety A safety certification node that looks for "dangerous" (as specified in the elevator requirements) operation of the elevator and sends an EmergencyBrakePayload message on the framework and network if such a condition is detected.
SafetySensorCanPayloadTranslator  
VarIntegerCanTranslator Utility superclass for CAN payload translators with an integer value.
 

Enum Summary
Door.DoorMotionState  
Door.DoorState  
 

Exception Summary
SafetyViolationException This exception is thrown when the elevator violates a safety condition.
 

Package simulator.elevatormodules Description

Provides sensors for detecting car position, door position, and door reversal triggers, and actuators for turning on button lights moving the doors.
